name: The Spirit of La Niebla
description:
Content Warning: The game includes BLOOD, SUICIDE and BULLYING content.

The Spirit of La Niebla is a point-and-click puzzle adventure game where players investigate a mystery through conversation and by unlocking dialogue options through collecting discoverable objects, and ultimately they make a critical choice depending on their findings. 

There are two distinct phases to the game, an expository Interview phase where the player is required to speak with each of the three main NPCs to get their perspective on the strange happenings at the school, and a Discovery/Interrogation phase where the player collects discoverable objects via puzzle minigame and asks the main NPCs about the items they have discovered. The ultimate goal is to collect enough evidence to make a report to the Principal on whether or not the school is actually haunted. Depending on the type of evidence found and what is done with it, the player can trigger one of 8 unique endings contingent on what answer is given and their interactions with two of the main NPCs.
